headline: Jefferies lifts rating on Sunbelt REITs stocks on stronger growth
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies upgraded three Sunbelt-focused real estate investment trusts or REITs, Camden Property (NYSE:CPT) Trust, Independence Realty (NYSE:IRT) Trust, and Mid-America Apartments to "Buy" from "Hold" given the improving supply trends and stronger rent growth in the coming years.

content.title: Jefferies lifts rating on Sunbelt REITs stocks on stronger growth
